channel.title: pmemobjfs on PMem.io
channel.description: Recent content in pmemobjfs on PMem.io

item.title: pmemobjfs - The simple FUSE based on libpmemobj
item.description: How to use it The sources of the pmemobjfs file system are available here. Please refer to README file for instructions on how to create a file system layout and mount it. NOTE: This is just an example implementation of file system in user space using the libpmemobj library and it is not considered to be production quality. Please do not use this file system to store your data you care about because it may be lost.
